com.stripe.android.view

Class StripeActivity

  • com.stripe.android.view.StripeActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddPaymentMethodActivity, PaymentFlowActivity

    public class StripeActivity

    Provides a toolbar, save button, and loading states for the save button.
